keyMoments.description: The entire Straw Hat crew battles a Pacifista cyborg at Grove 12
keyMoments.significance: One of the crew's most desperate battles, facing technology that seems unstoppable

keyMoments.description: The Monster Trio (Luffy, Zoro, Sanji) coordinate a powerful combined attack
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates improved teamwork among the crew's strongest members

keyMoments.description: Captain Hawkins battles Admiral Kizaru using his Devil-Conquering Phase
keyMoments.significance: Shows the captain's full power, though he is ultimately defeated

keyMoments.description: Captain Drake reveals his Ancient Zoan powers while fighting the Pacifista and Kizaru
keyMoments.significance: First Ancient Zoan transformation shown, though captain is defeated by Kizaru

keyMoments.description: Captain Apoo uses his unique sound-based abilities against Admiral Kizaru
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the captain's creative Devil Fruit powers, though he is ultimately defeated

keyMoments.description: Captain Urouge uses his transformation ability and Inga Zarashi technique
keyMoments.significance: Shows the captain's Devil Fruit power before being defeated by Kizaru
